SET(TARGET_NAME "PoDoFo-tools")
IF(SUPPORT_PDF AND PODOFO_FOUND)
	INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

	FILE(GLOB ${TARGET_NAME}_SRCS *.cpp)
	FILE(GLOB ${TARGET_NAME}_HDRS *.h)

	ADD_LIBRARY(${TARGET_NAME} ${${TARGET_NAME}_SRCS} ${${TARGET_NAME}_HDRS})

	SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES("${TARGET_NAME}" PROPERTIES FOLDER "${FOLDERNAME}/${TARGET_NAME}")

	MESSAGE("[X] ${TARGET_NAME}")

	MESSAGE("[ ] ${TARGET_NAME}")
ENDIF()
